definitions.definition: The narrow wooden centre piece of a chair back.
The sharp, atonal sound of a liquid or soft solid hitting a solid surface.
definitions.example: I didn't see the egg fall, but I heard the splat when it hit the floor.

definitions.definition: The irregular shape of a viscous liquid or soft solid which has hit a solid surface.
definitions.example: The canvas was covered by seemingly careless splats of paint.

definitions.definition: The Command key on an Apple Macintosh.
Any of various characters appearing in computer character sets.
A move in playboating involving stalling in place while positioned vertically against a solid object in the water.
To hit a flat surface and deform into an irregular shape.
definitions.example: The egg splatted onto the floor.
She splatted the roach with her shoe.

definitions.definition: To combine different textures by applying an alpha channel map to the higher levels, revealing the layers underneath where the map is partially or completely transparent.
